page.title: 03MILLHOUSE RESTAURANT-TARNOCK
page.content: SITUATED ON THE A38 AND ABOUT 6 MILES NORTH OF BURNHAM-ON-SEA.THIS OLD MILL HOUSE WAS CONVERTED SOME 5 YEARS AGO. THE OWNERS PROVIDE ALL MEALS FOR PASSING MOTORISTS AND LOCAL PEOPLE.IN ADDITION THEY PROVIDE BED AND BREAKFAST.HAVING 3 GUEST ROOMS AND THEY ALSO CATER AT HOME FOR PEOPLE. THE OLD ATMOSPHERE HAS BEEN RETAINED BY HAVING WHITE WALLS WITH OLD WOODEN BEAMS PICKED OUT IN BLACK.THE OLD WALLS AND WINDOWS SHOW THE SIZE OF THE ORIGINAL BUILDINGS. UPSTAIRS,THE ROOF BEAMS SHOW THAT AT LEAST 3 ROOFS HAVE BEEN BUILT. THE RESTAURANT IS COMFORTABLE AND ELEGANT A PLEASENT PLACE TO EAT AND TO RELAX AND ENJOY THE COMPANIONSHIP OF FRIENDS.
